gate_purpose: Payload schema valid / required fields present
notes: Strict payload schema should enforce required borrower/loan/property fields

gate_purpose: All required checklist items are present (not missing)
notes: Blocks progression to READY_FOR_REVIEW if any required item is missing

gate_purpose: All required checklist items are accepted (docs reviewed; signals satisfied via checklist items)
notes: If any required doc is pending review/rejected; this stays false

gate_purpose: All required approval signals satisfied
notes: Relies on checklist signal items marked required:true

gate_purpose: Payload + required items accepted
notes: Intermediate gate for debugging: is it payload or checklist?

gate_purpose: Loan take-out may proceed to lock/settle
notes: Final gate; keep explicit !has_rejected for clarity even if implied by required_accepted

gate_purpose: Payload schema valid / required fields present
notes: Includes spouse fields if schema requires them

gate_purpose: All required checklist items are present (not missing)
notes: Marriage certificate + spouse ID typically required

gate_purpose: All required checklist items are accepted
notes: Spouse docs often require human review

gate_purpose: All required approval signals satisfied
notes: Includes spouse_consent_captured if marked required in checklist

gate_purpose: Payload + required items accepted
Loan take-out may proceed to lock/settle

notes: Widower schema may omit spouse consent but include spouse linkage fields

gate_purpose: All required checklist items are present (not missing)
notes: Death certificate required; marriage certificate may be optional per policy

gate_purpose: Payload + required items accepted
Enhanced Pag-IBIG take-out may proceed to lock/settle
expression: gate.evidence_ready && gate.pagibig_membership_ok && gate.pagibig_eligibility_ok && gate.pagibig_appraisal_done && gate.enhanced_review_done && signal.takeout_authorized && !checklist.has_rejected
notes: Adds senior_approval on top of standard requirements
